00014 class FileOperations {
00015 public:
00016         static void writeToFile(string fname, char* data, int dataSize) {
00017                 FILE *fp = 0;
00018                 fp = fopen(fname.c_str(), "a+");
00019                 if ( ! fp ) Main::getInstance()->handleError("Couldn't open file to write: "+fname);
00020                 fwrite(data, sizeof(char), dataSize, fp);
00021         }
00022 
00023 };
